title: of that section as they relate to the State bodies to which the following order
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 9 November 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) order 2020 (2) order come operation 9 november 2020

title: of that section as they relate to the State bodies to which the following order
heading: 2. The following State bodies are designated for the purposes of section 29
text_raw:
2. The following State bodies are designated for the purposes of section 29 
of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 
13 of 2020): 

An Bord Pleanála, established under section 3 of the Local Government 
(Planning and Development) Act 1976 (No. 20 of 1976); 

Ordnance Survey Ireland, established under section 3 of the Ordnance Survey 
Ireland Act 2001 (No. 43 of 2001); 

The Housing and Sustainable Communities Agency, established under Article 4 
of the Housing and Sustainable Communities Agency (Establishment) Order 
2012 (S.I. No. 264 of 2012); 

The Housing Finance Agency, established under section 2 of the Housing 
Finance Agency Act 1981 (No. 37 of 1981); 

The Land Development Agency, established under Article 4 of the Land 
Development Agency (Establishment) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 352 of 2018), as 
amended by Article 2 of the Land Development Agency (Amendment) Order 
2018 (S.I. No. 603 of 2018); 

The National Oversight and Audit Commission, established under Part 12A of 
the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001), as inserted by section 61 of 
the Local Government Reform Act 2014 (No. 1 of 2014); 

The Property Registration Authority, established under section 9 of the 
Registration of Deeds and Title Act 2006 (No. 12 of 2006); 

The Pyrite Resolution Board, established under section 8 of the Pyrite Resolution 
Act 2013 (No. 51 of 2013); 

The Residential Tenancies Board, established under section 150 of the 
Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (No. 27 of 2004), as re-named under section 13 
of the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2015 (No. 42 of 2015); and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Water Forum, established under section 25 of the Water Services Act 2017 
(No. 29 of 2017). 

[517] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 November, 2020. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [517] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
